summary: The diff implements all four requirements. ChatArea.tsx reduces spacing from space-y-4 to space-y-1 (REQ-2). MessageBubble.tsx adds a custom context menu with Copy Text, right-click and long-press support, and CSS/JS to suppress native mobile long-press (REQ-3, REQ-4). Usernames, avatars, and layout are preserved (REQ-1). No hallucinated features detected.
